title: THESE Guys Are Doing It Right!! Good Solutions Put Into Practice Can Go A LONG WAY!!!
cleaned_text:
When it comes to the battle for our fundamental freedoms it’s important to acknowledge people who are seeing success is this fight!

In Quebec some politicians are now refusing to swear an oath of loyalty to the new King Charles III and in Alberta, Premiere Danielle Smith is urging businesses to drop all vaccine policies ahead of her plan to change the human rights law!

Meanwhile in Vermont a town employee took matters into his own hands by secretly lowering the fluoride levels in the water supply for over a decade!

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the brave men and women who are taking a bold stand for the rights of others even if it jeopardizes their livelihoods.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
